# Contributing to UPI MCC Checker

Contributions are welcome! Please feel free to submit a Pull Request.

## Tech Stack

- HTML
- CSS
- JavaScript

- ig you have the stuff needed to run a single html ðŸ’€

## Installation

1. Clone the repository:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/GamerJagdish/Rand.git
cd Rand
```

2. Start Writing

## Running the App

### Development Server

Double click the file to launch it in Browser OwO
